hiveArticle.title: On the Way - Nature's Beauty at its Best
hiveArticle.body:
Travelling through the roads, Way to Alleppey. Nature's Beauty at its best.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWyHf1hTUbBV8HDvnWidyVG88p7rtFNVGKaVcRa5SHWim/image.png)

View of a Mountain

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbnHJjVq65eDoNVxCoozvbHFUuBn5yYzZpKQKunnCXrco/image.png)

Find me if you can - Elephant

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUn54qpH1rbi5NRLsdsnuHbiSKKpVWfcH1vqB72awnBbX/image.png)

Some good soul

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTu8kbvLMpvSHGJykcMjjdVh5ePppUqoJ8btKffoXYdEW/image.png)

Lone Wanderer

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVmZRqwDz64bSqc52HJxvrMfT6uDvrazEWW5gamgXbiwd/image.png)
